body_content.explanation: in philosophy, a belief that is opposed to realism (= the belief that objects continue to exist even when no one is there to see them):
examples: Central to the debate between realism and anti-realism is the distinction between what is observable and what is not.

body_content.explanation: paintings, films, books, etc. that do not try to represent life as it really is:
examples: It fails to create convincing characters and has the stylized anti-realism of a game.
